title: 3 and Out - 2nd Year QB Pressure, USC NIL Death Star, Mailbag
itunes:title: 3 and Out - 2nd Year QB Pressure, USC NIL Death Star, Mailbag
description:
John discusses the pressure and expectations facing Trevor Lawrence, Zach Wilson and the other 2nd year QB’s, why Hunter Renfrow is the perfect piece for Josh McDaniel in his first year with the Raiders, and why Lincoln Riley and USC are set up to be an NIL superpower. He also answers listener questions in the Middlekauff Mailbag. #herd

Subscribe NOW and follow Middlekauff and The Volume on Twitter, Instagram and YouTube for the latest content. It's always  FanDuel for the best wagering action!

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
